TASK: Craft an item of type: purple_bed
inventory=[{"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 58, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fermented_spider_eye", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a purple_bed, I first need to craft acacia_planks. To craft acacia_planks, I need to place the acacia_wood in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1
